row._WebConfig: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-15" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE Content [ <!ELEMENT Content ( #PCDATA | PARAMETER )* > <!ELEMENT PARAMETER ( #PCDATA | UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST | VALUTA | MANDANTEN | PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA | PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA )* > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST WERT CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA WERT CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA WERT CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST VALUTA BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST VALUTA PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST VALUTA WERT CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST VALUTA SEPPL CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN BESCHREIBUNG CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN PLAUSI CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN WERT CDATA "null" > <!ATTLIST MANDANTEN SEPPL CDATA "null" > ]> <Content> <PARAMETER> <UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST BESCHREIBUNG="UC4 Deployment Test" PLAUSI="JN" SEPPL="" WERT="N"/> <VALUTA BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="JJJJMM" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT=""/> <MANDANTEN BESCHREIBUNG="" PLAUSI="01,02,20,21,54" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="01,02,20,21,54"/> <PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="AUSSCHL"/> <PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA BESCHREIBUNG="Stufe der Protokollierung in der Datenbank" PLAUSI="INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE" SEPPL="EIWP" WERT="WARN"/> </PARAMETER> </Content>

row.process:
!BBS Standart-Include zum setzen von Variablen für aufgerufene Jobs :INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrückt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &VALUTA#,,"VALUTA [JJJJMM]",'',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02,20,21,54',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &VALUTA# = &VALUTA# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# !**************End of GeneratedText**************
